Quirks About Me

Get to Know me a Little

  • How Do I feel about Email?

    A limited format, in a world that requires so much more detail and organization.

  • What Computer Do I Use?

    I go through a MacBook Pro about every 2 years. I tend to demand a lot out of my computers. I melted the hard drive for one rendering a product video for a client. This has made me PARANOID about backups.

  • What Development Languages do I know?

    HTML, and CSS easily. I can read and write some Java script, and C. In love with Git and Github.

  • What Music Do I listen to?

    While Working, 90% of the time acoustic or instrumental. Ranging from Pop to Classical.

  • Love (Design)

    I think, eat, breath, and sleep Design circa 2007. It all started with a Professor Asking me “Kyle Why do you want to be a Designer?"

  • Born in USA

    Born in the USA… Moved to the South when I was 10 and gained an appreciation of sweet tea and the phrase ‘ya’ll’.
